about_the_game:
Help the young master of an ancient Tibetan game hunt for amazing treasures in “Bato: Treasures of Tibet”. Let stones of the same color collide to clear the entire game board and continue your awesome journey! Meet curious characters as you take part in an thrilling adventure. Master the incredible power ups to make it to the end of your travels and win amazing treasures! This game becomes more challenging along the way, so make sure your skills improve fast. Are you ready for this adventure in the wonderful Tibet? Play Bato now!

  • Complete challenging levels by knocking stones of the same colour together.
  • Play quickly, strategically, and accurately to clear the board.
  • Receive help from your great mentor and the famous multi-handed god figurine.
  • Earn points, blessings, and mana for upgrades that can help you during levels.
detailed_description:
Cave Quest 3 is in development


Please wishlist it if you like to support us!


About the Game

Help the young master of an ancient Tibetan game hunt for amazing treasures in “Bato: Treasures of Tibet”. Let stones of the same color collide to clear the entire game board and continue your awesome journey! Meet curious characters as you take part in an thrilling adventure. Master the incredible power ups to make it to the end of your travels and win amazing treasures! This game becomes more challenging along the way, so make sure your skills improve fast. Are you ready for this adventure in the wonderful Tibet? Play Bato now!

  • Complete challenging levels by knocking stones of the same colour together.
  • Play quickly, strategically, and accurately to clear the board.
  • Receive help from your great mentor and the famous multi-handed god figurine.
  • Earn points, blessings, and mana for upgrades that can help you during levels.
name: Bato: Treasures of Tibet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Help the young master of an ancient Tibetan game hunt for amazing treasures in this thrilling Match 3 game. Play quickly, strategically, and accurately to clear the board.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish, Czech
